explains: n. 拉丁语；拉丁人；拉丁音乐
adj. 拉丁语的，用拉丁语写成的；拉丁语系国家（或民族）的；拉丁人的

sentences.en: Very few students learn Latin now.
sentences.cn: 现在学拉丁语的学生少得很。

sentences.en: Latin nouns have case, number and gender.
sentences.cn: 拉丁语名词有格、数和性。

sentences.en: Cuba was one of the least Catholic of the Latin countries.
sentences.cn: 古巴是拉丁语国家中最不信仰天主教的国家之一。
